abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn said Monday that he was suing Motorola to force it to hand over documents related to its mobile devices business, and he urged investors to elect his slate of candidates to the Motorola board.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn said Monday that he was suing Motorola to force it to hand over documents related to its mobile devices business, and he urged investors to elect his slate of candidates to the Motorola board.

headline.main: Icahn Steps Up Pressure on Motorola
